Package org.forgerock.openig.security

Provides heap objects for security related types (KeyStore, KeyManagerFactory, ...).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KeyManagerHeaplet
    Represents an SSL Java KeyManager.
    KeyStoreHeaplet
    Represents a loaded Java KeyStore.
    SecurityHeapletFactory
    Builds dedicated Heaplet instances for KeyStore, KeyManager and TrustManager heap objects.
    TrustManagerHeaplet
    Represents an SSL Java TrustManager.

Package org.forgerock.openig.security Description

Provides heap objects for security related types (KeyStore, KeyManagerFactory, ...).
Since:
3.1
